name: Motor Highway Shooting
description:
Passing through narrow tracks on highway routes and heavy traffic using realistic controls and show your best moves on heavy bike ride

Amazing Features :
- Real life bike driving experience.
- New free racing moto bike driving game of 2017 with thrilling new high tracks.
- Amazing tracks dangerous
- Smooth and realistic bike handling on highway tracks.
- Stunning realistic graphics, Excellent eye catching animation and graphics.
